member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Settings.SettingDefinition.IsVisibleToClients
member.summary: Can clients see this setting and it's value. It maybe dangerous for some settings to be visible to clients (such as an email server password). Default: false.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Settings.SettingDefinition.Providers
member.summary: A list of allowed providers to get/set value of this setting. An empty list indicates that all providers are allowed.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Settings.SettingDefinition.IsInherited
member.summary: Is this setting inherited from parent scopes. Default: True.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Settings.SettingDefinition.Properties
member.summary: Can be used to get/set custom properties for this setting definition.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Settings.SettingDefinition.IsEncrypted
member.summary: Is this setting stored as encrypted in the data source. Default: False.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Settings.SettingDefinition.WithProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a property in the dictionary. This is a shortcut for nested calls on this object.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Settings.SettingDefinition.WithProviders(System.String[])
member.summary: Sets a property in the dictionary. This is a shortcut for nested calls on this object.
